description:
Serara is a young Druid of the Crescent Moon Alliance. She is level 19 when first introduced. Her secondary class is Maid, and she often regrets choosing it because it only helps her to perform housekeeping. After hiding from enemies with Nyanta for a while, she developed a crush on him, making Shiroe and Naotsugu wonder if she has a fetish for middle-aged men.
Source: Wiki
name: Serara
